xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: This module provides functions that gets components of the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Nicolae Brinza

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the base URI.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The base URI.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:base-uri
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:base-uri() as xs:string? external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the boundary whitespace policy used by direct element constructors.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: Either preserve or strip.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:boundary-space-policy
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:boundary-space-policy() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the static context construction mode of element and document nodes.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: Either preserve or strip.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:construction-mode
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:construction-mode() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the static context components that control the the namespace bindings that are assigned when an existing element node is copied by an element constructor.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of two strings: the first is either preserve or no-preserve and the second is either inherit or no-inherit.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:copy-namespaces-mode
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:copy-namespaces-mode() as xs:string+ external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets one of statically known collations used by functions and operators for comparing and ordering values of type xs:string or xs:anyURI when no explicit collation is specified.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The collations that is used by default.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:default-collation
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:default-collation() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the statically known default collection type. This is the type of the sequence of nodes that would result from calling the fn:collection function with no arguments.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The type of the default collection.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:default-collection-type
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:default-collection-type() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the URI of the default function namespace.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The URI of the of the default function namespace.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:default-function-namespace
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:default-function-namespace() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the component that controls the processing of empty sequences and NaN values as ordering keys in an order by clause in a FLWOR expression.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: Either greatest or least.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:default-order
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:default-order() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the list of annotations declared for the given function.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $arity The number of arguments the function takes.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: the list of annotations

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:function-annotations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:function-annotations($name as xs:QName, $arity as xs:integer) as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the number of arguments the given XQuery function takes.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: Either a sequence of zero or more integers (one for each overloaded version of the given function) or an empty sequence if the function is not defined.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:function-arguments-count
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:function-arguments-count($function as xs:QName) as xs:int* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence containing the QNames of all defined functions that are available to be called from within an expression.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence for QNames identifying all functions.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:function-names
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:function-names() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of JSON objects containing the name, arity, and annotations of all defined functions that are available to be called form within an expression.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of objects.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:functions
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:functions() as object()* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying declared attributes in the imported schemas.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each attribute.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-attribute-declarations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-attribute-declarations() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying declared in-scope schema attribute groups.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each attribute group.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-attribute-groups
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-attribute-groups() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying declared elements in the imported schemas.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each declared element.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-element-declarations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-element-declarations() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying declared in-scope schema element groups.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each element group.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-element-groups
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-element-groups() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying in-scope schema types including all the predefined schema types and all definitions found in imported schemas.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each defined type.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-schema-types
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-schema-types() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence of QNames identifying declared variables from the static context.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of QNames, one for each variable.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:in-scope-variables
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:in-scope-variables() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the value of an option that is declared in the prolog of the module.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name the name of the option value to retrieve
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: the value of the option if contained in the static context or the empty sequence otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:option
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:option($name as xs:QName) as xs:string? external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the ordering mode that affects the ordering of the result sequences returned by certain expressions.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: Either ordered or unordered.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:ordering-mode
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:ordering-mode() as xs:string external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence that contains the statically known collations.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The sequence of collations.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:statically-known-collations
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:statically-known-collations() as xs:anyURI* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a sequence that contains the URIs of all statically known documents.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The sequence of document URIs.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:statically-known-documents
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:statically-known-documents() as xs:anyURI* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: For the given document, returns the static type of its root node.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The static type of the given document.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:statically-known-document-type
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:statically-known-document-type($document as xs:string) as xs:QName external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the bound URI for the given prefix.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $prefix The prefix of the known namespace for which the bound URI is being requested.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The URI bound to the prefix is returned, or an empty sequence if the prefix is not known.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:statically-known-namespace-binding
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:statically-known-namespace-binding($prefix as xs:string) as xs:string? external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets a list of known statically known namespaces as prefixes (fn, xml, xs, xsi, etc).
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence of xs:strings, one for each known namespace prefix.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:statically-known-namespaces
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:statically-known-namespaces() as xs:string* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets true or false depending on whether rules for compatibility with XPath 1.0 are in effect. XQuery set the value of this component to false.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: The function should return false.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: sctx:xpath10-compatibility-mode
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function sctx:xpath10-compatibility-mode() as xs:boolean external
